title: apparel design
snippet:
I am looking to have you to five unique apparel products designed for our liquor store.  We currently stock shirts from https://thekyshop.com and like their styling and catchy phrases.  We also like the styling of the apparel at https://shop.magnoliamarket.com/collections/apparel.

We have never hired for this before, and I am not sure of this project should price out as.  Therefore, I have entered an amount that I thought might work; and because you are required to.

Thank you and I look forward to hearing from you.
